bibl.title: Un'iscrizione tolemaica ad Antinoupolis.
bibl.note: Inscribed gray granite block found in the year 2010 in the southern area of the town. Dedicatory inscription for a statue of Ptolemy XII. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Rosario Pintaudi, Un'iscrizione tolemaica ad Antinoupolis.
Loretta Del Francia Barocas & Mario Cappozzo (edd.), Egitto e mondo antico. Studi per Claudio Barocas = RSO 85 (2012) pp. 411-420.
Inscribed gray granite block found in the year 2010 in the southern area of the town. Dedicatory inscription for a statue of Ptolemy XII. - Avec résumé en anglais.
